lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I love to help small business owners!
lender.occupational_info: I guide people to grow their businesses in Toronto, Ontario.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Instead of buying gifts for my friends and family, I make loans. Loans are gifts that keep giving!
lender.occupational_info: I teach the history of the United States and the state California to university students.

lender.name: Dode
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to do so
lender.occupational_info: I am working toward raising money to build a private nonprofit university if the Republic of Benin (West Africa). Higher Education is a right, not a privilege. Please visit my site www.aiufoundation.org to learn more about how you can help bring this vision into reality.

lender.name: Ilona
lender.loan_because: I love to help.
lender.occupational_info: Wonderful!

lender.name: Z.L. Thomas
lender.loan_because: Some people need money to set off their business and I have some, not much,but the means to do so.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: julie & seth
lender.loan_because: we care about our brothers and sisters around the world.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I love Kiva's mission

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: I wish to participate, in a positive way, in our global economy, without simply buying things from other nations. I believe it is time for all of us to recognize that we are One World, and thus we should act accordingly.
lender.occupational_info: Unemployed

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: I work for a small-medium sized business lender

lender.name: Just Me
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Kaitie
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are working to accomplish something and want to help. And while I don't have a lot of money to give, its nice to know that even a little can make a difference.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I am ashamed that parts of the world are rich compared to parts of the world in poverty, and want to do my part to help people in a sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an accountant. I complete tax paperwork and financial statements for people and thier businesses. This involves sitting at a desk with a computer most of the day.

lender.name: Yuto
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to make the world better. I think this loan gets all of us to be happy.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: my Uncle said it is good to donate. So, he got me the gift certificate for my birthday.I used it quickly the next day!
lender.occupational_info: I learn lots of subjects and my favorite is reading books. I also like Math.

lender.name: Lorell
lender.loan_because: I am getting married August 30, and we are hoping to donate some money instead of receiving some cash gifts and instead of spending money on decorations.
lender.occupational_info: I am in my final year of becoming a teacher for high school students.

lender.name: jeffrey
lender.occupational_info: Create a sustainable community based on recreation for education where the profit from this social enterprise is used to solve social problems.

lender.name: Glenn, Julie & Haley
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I admire those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Caro
lender.loan_because: I can, it's great to feel that you can be of some help to people that are keen to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I'm Studio Manager for a Visual Communications company. We design all types of visual communications - ads, packaging, websites etc

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping entrepreneurs who do not have access to traditional capital markets. I usually focus on loans to buy equipment or supplies for expanding the lenders' businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I recuit new employees for the company I work for.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: it can change someones life for the better... I have been blessed with so much and feel its my duty to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a not-for-profit organisation that is trying to find solutions to poverty in Tanzania, I am also studying International Studies at Uni.

lender.name: Davallia Bookclub
lender.loan_because: We are aware we are fortunate to live in a country where we can speak our mind without fear of retribution and we know we are able to feed our families each day - unfortunately some other mothers throughout the world cannot and we should all do what we can to rectify this.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: Just consider me a humanitarian...I enjoy helping those in need anyway that I can and this is a good cause...helping people around the world help themselves to improve their quality of life! :)

lender.name: Dallas
lender.loan_because: Well, I don't have much... But I have a little spare from time to time. So I'm happy to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Hopefully soon I too will also have my own business. But for now, I move money for large companies.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: Blessings are meant to be shared with others. Give more, receive more.

lender.name: Kym
lender.loan_because: other people should be given the opportunity to get ahead
lender.occupational_info: high school teacher

lender.name: RICHARD & TERRI
lender.loan_because: I think in Australia we live in a safe secure environment and receive good incomes we should therefore help out those less fortunate than ourselves
lender.occupational_info: I sell health and fitness equipment like walking machines and exercise bikes

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can use small amounts of money to significantly help someone a world away.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large, urban public school helping to keep their computer networks working. I understand working with little money and old equipment, making do with what you have on hand.

lender.name: Lisa und Max
lender.loan_because: Because we want to help others. We get money from our grandparents for good school-reports and we lend the money.
lender.occupational_info: Lisa: 4 grade grammar school Max: 1 grade grammar school

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I think it's quiet easy: Act! Now! And don't wait for others to do the first step...
lender.occupational_info: I work as a freelance consultant, helping my clients to improve their business.

lender.name: TUZO
lender.loan_because: i.Iam looking for business partiner or ii A loan for develop the 150 acres of land.
lender.occupational_info:
i will practice Hotculture which is very marketerable in the area
please bless my dream to reality

lender.name: MARY
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer my time to help others, mostly children

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I thing participating in Kiva is a good way of helping people in a personal way.
lender.occupational_info: Computer related administration

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help other people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find jobs.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers a method of helping out those who want to be helped with funding that can be "re used" (so to speak) again and again.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and printers to transform a client's information into printed documents

lender.name: Vanish
lender.loan_because: Because I can, I suppose.

lender.name: YogaMama
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to be able to be a part of someone's success with many other lenders around the whole world!!
lender.occupational_info: Ancient Yoga blesses people emotionally, mentally and physically and I love teaching and sharing it.

lender.name: Isaiah
lender.loan_because: I care about the world and although many will say money doesnt buy happiness it does buy food and shelter. The Earth belongs to those who live on it!
lender.occupational_info: In the United States we have food restaurants where you drive a vehicle up to a window and purchase something to eat, drink or both! I however am a carhop and what we do is instead of giving the food through a window we walk the food out to the buyers car! I meet many great people.

lender.name: Floris
lender.loan_because: Hoping to reduce poverty by stimulating entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are working hard to build their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce their risk of loss by fire or other perils by providing insurance that will replace their property in case of loss.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I needed help and got it. Now I can afford to help the next person. Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I ask wealthy people to give money to help organizations that need financial assistance. Americans are very generous.

lender.name: Devi
lender.loan_because: I love microfinance. I worked with a fantastic microfinance organization in India a few years ago, and want to stay involved in the movement while I focus on other things for a while.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies solve their biggest business problems and operate better.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it is so easy to do and it helps out those that need a hand-up!

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: People around the world have good ideas on how to improve their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that invents medicines. I visit doctors and explain how the medicines work and how to correctly use them.

lender.name: Seamus
lender.loan_because: I work a pretty bad job. It's pretty much the standard all other bad jobs are compared to. But even as bad as I think I have it, there are people in some of these countries that would kill to get a job with twice the workload and half the pay. So I figure, hey, why not help out? I don't feel I'm obligated to, or that someone who doesn't is a bad person, I just think it's a nice thing to do, yea?
lender.occupational_info: I scrub the bathrooms, mop the floors, and pick up trash. Pretty exciting, isn't it?

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I feel we must help each other in this life. I can not be happy with what I have earned or have been given if I can not share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I care for teens with emotional problems. I try to help people feel hopeful and understand that we all have purpose.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I have been to Cambodia many times and am so grateful to be able to make a difference in people's lives there.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to see others provide for themselves and their families with my help.
lender.occupational_info: I design, install and maintain network devices in hospitals to help doctors provide patient care.

lender.name: Gian
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Social Media, Collaboration, Knowledge Management, Learning & Development

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: "We can let the circumstances of our lives harden us so that we become increasingly resentful and afraid, or we can let them soften us and make us kinder and more open to what scares us. We always have this choice." - Pema Chodron

lender.name: Vivek
lender.loan_because: I like to see empowerment in people's lives. I think its the right thing to do. I can afford it. These people want to work, they don't want to be on the dole. And finally, they want free trade not foreign aid. Availability of capital and credit to modernize and expand is the path to financial freedom.
lender.occupational_info: Providing liquidity by spreading the risk of mortgages from banks to pension funds, money managers, insurance companies and hedge funds.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I have just started, and I wanted to be helpful to someone in a country I have spent time in, so I picked Vietnam.
lender.occupational_info: I help make movies and TV shows. I also take photographs.

lender.name: Edward Bos
lender.loan_because: Starting your own business is admirable, taking charge and responsibility of you own life. It's often difficult and should be supported all around the world. You starters have my respect!
lender.occupational_info: Helping starting entrepreneurs with starting there business by coaching, motivate and advise them to start the best way possible and to achieve realistic goals and continuity.

lender.name: Yassir
lender.loan_because: This is an extremely powerful way to make a significant difference in the lives of poor people and to help them lift themselves out of poverty. A small investment by us, will yield tremendous long-term returns to them.
lender.occupational_info: Communications for an Int'l non-profit that is breeding crops that are richer in nutrients(vitamin A, zinc, iron) to improve health of the poor. Also a web-writer. If you like plants check out my websites www.houseplantsnow.com or argusorchids.net

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: If we can, we should.
lender.occupational_info: I write for money.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can. I am grateful for what I have, and want to be an entrepreneur myself one day.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have so much and it takes so little to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I share nature with people from the city and help others do the same.

lender.name: WesternBrother
lender.loan_because: as a musical group, we have a platform that allows us to inform others about what is going on around the world, and the tangible ways these problems can be fixed. (i.e. Kiva). We have been blessed by the Lord so we can now bless others with 100 percent of the money we make from this band.
lender.occupational_info: We write music, we play concerts, we get money from playing concerts, from fans, and from selling merchandise. 100 percent of that money is going to Kiva microloans.

lender.name: Tomahawk Ranch
lender.loan_because: God is great and all things belong to him. To see God's hand at work here is a delight.
lender.occupational_info: I raise angora goats. They are sheared twice a year for their mohair fiber. Mohair is great for spinning, weaving, knitting & felting.

lender.name: Reva
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful idea that works. I have the opportunity of making a difference with a small amount of money. By everyone else donating we can make such a tremendous impact together to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law firm that deals with family law - separations, divorces, marriage contracts. It is a very busy office and can be very stressful at times. You need to have a sympathetic ear.

lender.name: Peter C
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because:
And the King will say, I tell you the truth, when you did it to one of the least of these my brothers and sisters, you were doing it to me! (Matt 25:40)
I honor hard working individuals.
We were able to pay for my daughter's university education and I want to help youth that have to do it on their own.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible to collect money from clients who buy advertising on my company's TV stations.

lender.name: Jette Andreassen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a different

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to offer direct support to people so they can take charge of their own destinies, and help their families and communities. Gives me some hope for the world!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a treatment program for people with gambling problems.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: it means somebody's life! I desire to support the growth of women in business, especially in South/Central America. I have traveled there several times and appreciate their dedication and hard work, not only in business but with their families. I also speak a bit of Spanish. Of course, everyone will always need food, so you will see my lending trend is the grocery/food industry.
lender.occupational_info: I make decisions to give loans to businesses in the United States.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel so fortunate that I can!
lender.occupational_info: I buy rundown apartments and remodel them, then rent them out.

lender.name: gir r
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in microfinancing as a tool to fight poverty and improve quality of life

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Why not??

lender.name: Jim and Penny
lender.loan_because: My heart tells me that Kiva is an extension of my love of Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people from all walks of life to help them with financial and insurance needs.

lender.name: Jeanne-Marie
lender.loan_because: a little here goes a long way there.
lender.occupational_info: I manage finances for our family business and care for my 2 young children.

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to help someone improve their quality of life by helping them help themselves.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I feel it is our responsibility to help others in need as the government will not. These people smile every day not knowing that they are less fortunate then many others yet we can complain daily over trivial things.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single mother of 3 beautiful boys. I work for Anglicare. I am not well off but feel that i am well off to alot of these people, i live in a house with a fire and are clothed and fed each day which most of us take for granted. I want my 3 young children to grow up giving and helping others less fortunate.

lender.name: Cameron & Jenny
lender.loan_because: We have all we really need and want to help others reach that point.
lender.occupational_info: We are currently working with schools in the New York City area.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: there are people in the world who, like me, are willing to work, but unlike me, are not as fortunat to have the funds for such a job
lender.occupational_info: work in a factory using machines to work with metal

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I attend university.

lender.name: Alice
lender.occupational_info: I teach Latin to students in grades 2 through 6 in a Chicago public school

lender.name: Katrine
lender.loan_because: There is only so much i need and there are people who need money more than i do
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from college and am working various jobs

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: there is nothing better than helping someone improve their current position. We take so much for granted in this country, including the easy access to low interest loans. Why not give someone the chance to expand their business and make their lives just a little easier?

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I want to help low-income individuals bridge the gap between poverty and empowerment.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to, I care, I can, I should, it's important, I owe something to everyone, kharma
lender.occupational_info: I help students enroll in college

lender.name: Isobel
lender.occupational_info: I work admin at the moment-sitting behind a desk. Bu have been a chef and lots of other things

lender.name: Yoshihisa
lender.loan_because: I would like to change the agriculture field. My mission is that to organize the world's information of food and agriculture and make it universally usable and no world of starvation.
lender.occupational_info: Managing a company to organize the infomation of agriculture in Japan, and make an EC site to sell the vegitables and fruites.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to be top baller in crowley family!
lender.occupational_info: Basically I ball all day!

lender.name: Jeff Green
lender.loan_because: I wish to do my part in helping others help themselves. If each person gave according to their ability, we could change the world. The gifts we give to others need not be monetary. Maybe all you can give away today is an uncertain, but well defined smile. Give that. Tomorrow, maybe you'll give away hugs. In no time at all, you'll be slinging bling-bling to unsuspecting passersby in a developing nation. (Be sure to maintain a genuine sense of charity that doesn't involve too much of your ego. Give because you know in your heart that improves happiness for everyone, not just yourself.) So we each should give, no matter what, according to our abilities. Consider this, if a rich man gave you a plate of tomatoes from his royal gardens, and then a poor man offered you a plate of tomatoes he grew with his own hands, and tomatoes were not so plentiful this year due to rains. Who gave you the most meaningful gift, the Nobleman or the Poor man? Same tomatoes...could it be that one of the gifts had tremendously greater value than the other?
lender.occupational_info: I work for the State of Oklahoma helping to ensure that our water supply is clean and readily available for use tomorrow and also many years down the road.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: It will help others
lender.occupational_info: I'm a business student at a large university

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: I can............Giving someone an opportunity is better than charity
lender.occupational_info: Fighting the MAN!!!

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I have a desire to make the world a better place and to help women achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a clerical worker for 40 years. I recently retired and now enjoy doing volunteer work and growing vegetables for our meals.

lender.name: shane
lender.loan_because: to give someone a go

lender.name: The Butler Five
lender.loan_because: We loan becuase we admire the determined entrepreneurs across the globe.

lender.name: Ruben
lender.loan_because: I believe every action, no matter how modest, can make a big difference.

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: My needs personal needs are satisfied, all i am left with are 'wants' so try and fulfill others essential needs, by giving them the gift of opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I wash dishes for money, superficially a pretty unimportant job, but with the money earned from it, i gain satisfaction with the thought that i can help others,

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all that I have and I want to help empower working women in other countries so they and their children can have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to stories of people's lives and turn them into movies that will inspire and educate many other people.

lender.name: Kiva Kiwis
lender.loan_because: It simply feels good to do something that furthers peoples lives.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: We are ONE!

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: My family believes in giving hard working, honest people opportunities to provide for their family, define their own destiny and embrace economic liberty
lender.occupational_info: I work in the computer software industry.

lender.name: Arctic Wolf
lender.loan_because: I've seen and experienced the hardships of life.
lender.occupational_info: I like to walk quickly and muse on life's quirks and perks

lender.name: Eirik
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: My parents are teaching me how lucky I am to have so many toys. I save up my pocket money and give some away to people who don't have as many things as me.
lender.occupational_info: I am kinder.

lender.name: Fabienne
lender.loan_because: I'm 15 years old, and I've watched people let others struggle all my life, which has't been very long. It tears my heart out to see people in need, and people who have the ability to give just walk right by like they've seen nothing. It's time for me to give back to the world, I wan't to help, I wan't to be a part of team KIVA, erasing poverty one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I attend an Art school for dance and poetry.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: It was a birthday gift from a friend and this is a real good thing! Much better than stuff I don't need and may be it will be a little piece of help for people who are fighting for surviving.
lender.occupational_info: I am reporting about KAIZEN. This means continous improvement in companies. I am sure KIVA will help to improve the situation of people all over the world.

lender.name: Carl-Johan
lender.loan_because: It feels good!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: ...the best way to help people is to help them support themselves
lender.occupational_info: I translate books, mostly non-fiction

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: My sister loaned me some money when I was twelve years old. We went together to Sears and found some white fabric with red strawberries on sale and we bought some red rickrack too. We went home and I made several aprons. I went from house to house in the neighborhood selling the aprons explaining I was earning money for summer camp. I sold out the first batch and had to go back for more fabric. I was able to pay half my way to summer camp (my parents paid the other half) and pay my sister back. Small loans work. My sister helped me when I needed it. Kiva is an opportunity for me to help somebody as my sister helped me.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I was very fortunate to be born in a part of the world where things are more easily available. I want to help make a difference for those people who are as hard working but who just need a little help to get things off the ground.

lender.name: Hollito
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a good way for "direct" help.
lender.occupational_info: Mechanical engineering for waste sorting and treatment plants

lender.name: Cordelia
lender.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a great idea!

lender.name: Thorsten
lender.occupation: businessman for audio- & visual media, musician
lender.loan_because: I am enthusiastic about KIVA ! For me it's provide an excellent chance to bring the money direct to the people and make the "world" a little bit better and more social by individual initiative :)

lender.name: Chris and Stefanie
lender.loan_because: Donating this way ensures that money falls into the hands of the people who need it the most.
lender.occupational_info: Chris works for a large mortgage administration company and ensures mortgages are being administered in accordance to state and federal law. Stefanie teaches aerobics, weightlifting, and cycling for exercise in gyms throughout Houston. In our leisure time, we both love to read and travel.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: these people need our help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the human resources department of a microbrewery. Primarily, I assist our employees with health and retirement benefits, manage the company's safety programs and do a lot of compensation analysis and project work for the management teams.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed in business and it makes me feel good!

lender.name: Milena
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around
lender.occupational_info: an incredible opportunty I have been given

lender.name: Salwa El-Maghwry
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to do what they love.

lender.name: Mack Family
lender.loan_because: We are business owners ourselves and know how important it is to have business financing available. Through Kiva we have an opportunity to impact businesses and lives all around the world.

lender.name: Rosalie
lender.loan_because: The entrepreneurs on Kiva are working hard and I am happy to help. I know I am lucky to have everything that I have and this is a great way to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the fund raising office of the visual and performing arts University I graduated from. I ask foundations to give us money to support our students.

lender.name: Koren
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to pursue my own business activities and interests and would like to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am working towards my masters of business administration degree at a school in Boston.

lender.name: gina
lender.loan_because:
hello gina ceroni I'm 22 years old and my daughter is ell Antonio de 2 aitos this year he returned to study theater in Intituto professional aiep in which I am behind in dues to continue estuudiando and give a better future for my daughter and my need 1350 dollars to pay arrears through my rut is to enable them 16377710k comprovar anything thanks
hola soy gina ceroni tengo 22 aos y ell es mi hija antonia de 2 aitos este ao he vuelto a estudiar teatro en el intituto profesional aiep en el cual me encuentro atrasada en cuotas para seguir estuudiando y darle un fututo mejor a mi y a mi hija necesito 1350 dolares para pagar las cuotas atrasadas gracias mi rut es 16377710k para que puedan comprovar cualquier cosa gracias
lender.occupational_info:
work in a callcenter at this time but the money is to fund my studies of what theater is my passion which I love I think there is much need to deliver love to make people feel emotions to hemanos beings not to forget about us
trabajo en un callcenter en este momento pero el dinero es para financiar mis estudios de teatro lo cual es mi pasion me encanta creo que hay mucha necesidad de entregar amor a la gente hacer sentir emociones a los seres hemanos para que no olvidemos quienes somos

lender.name: Reema Biswas
lender.occupational_info: Medical research done in lab to find answers to how blood vessels develop in the human body so that the process enhanced in case of wound healing or shut off in case of cancer.

lender.name: Prima Equity Partners
lender.loan_because: Through the returns of our investments we are able to make a positive change on the world around us.
lender.occupational_info: Prima Equity Partners is a private equity firm that invests globally and when we exit investments we take a portion of our proceeds and donate to great organizations like Kiva.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: There can be no peace in a world where poverty is allowed to persist, so all of us making a small difference....the drop in the bucket....will end up filling the bucket eventually.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them carry out their dreams & aspirations when it comes to one of the things that is so important to all of us...our homes. I'm very aware of how blessed we all are in our part of this world & how great the disparity is between us & most of the world's population. I also spend a great deal of time & energy in trying to improve the state of our environment for our descendants & believe what Deitrich Bonhoeffer is quoted as saying, that - " The ultimate test of a moral society is the kind of world it leaves for it's children."

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: Nothing will ever get better unless people do something to make it better.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher!

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: people need the support to do for themselves
lender.occupational_info: i teach university students to think about making the world better

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I loan because doing something is better than doing nothing. I try to pick arts related entrepreneurs because in impoverished environments the arts are one of the first things to be reduced.
lender.occupational_info: I design and animate images for film and television.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: As long as I have some money left, it is better to lend it to someone than to just let it grow rusty on a bank account.

lender.name: warren
lender.loan_because: To honor my wife of over 50 years, Rebecca Williamson Elrod and my children...Catherine, Susan and Dale.
lender.occupational_info: Retired chemical engineer with Gulf Oil Corporation for 30 years. World traveler.

lender.name: Raija
lender.loan_because: I believe that every little counts.

lender.name: nancilee
lender.loan_because: I like to see success
lender.occupational_info: I write about how our physical environment affects how we act, react and interact

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupation: Deep Trance Channel Director, Publishing, Psychic

lender.name: Daniel Stouffer
lender.loan_because: I wish to make a difference. If my modest funds can improve the lives of others worldwide, I'm all for it. I hope to be able to lend - lots - as my own small business grows.
lender.occupational_info: Every person that you meet knows something you do not - learn from them. Help mentor and educate them. I strive to turn on the light bulbs to the magic and exciting aspects of renewable, solar generated electricity. I'm working to promote the rental of solar systems in order to avoid the high upfront purchase expenses. Solar as a service is the way to go.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I want to make dreams come true!

lender.name: Professor G
lender.loan_because: helping one woman helps her entire family.
lender.occupational_info: I teach about culture and evolution to high school graduates.

lender.name: Jen G
lender.occupation: Director at Bay Area Video Coalition
lender.loan_because: I believe in small businesses and cooperatives, and women empowering themselves through entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a nonprofit organization that serves people through media. We train youth producers and adults, too, and support free speech expression.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people with good ideas achieve their goals.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: We are all small drops of water that are meant to come together in a very large sea of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I sing on stage with all kinds of bands and I teach people to sing. I also direct musical groups as they prepare for performances and sometimes I write music for them to sing.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I belong to you.
lender.occupational_info: I have been teaching and coaching kids ever since I was in high school and I see the power of one-one interaction. We have an incredible ability to change the lives of the people around us just by caring and taking action.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: We are all connected; how can we not help?
lender.occupational_info: Serving my community through a volunteer network that seeks to facilitate the path from intent to action.

lender.name: Nomi
lender.loan_because: Tikkun Olam, which in hebrew means "repairing the world," starts with equal opportunity and treatment.
lender.occupational_info: My dream has long been to help others create a positive message for their business or organization so they may acheive their goal. Lending through Kiva is one way I can help someone else realize their own dream today.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I like to give back to the world that gives so much to me.
lender.occupational_info:
USA-ONE Interactive, Inc. was founded by Bill Thomas, a successful entrepreneur, author, speaker, and business development executive with more than 25 years of experience in US & global business.
Thomas has extensive SMB support services experience and is a renowned small business marketing expert.
He holds an MBA from Regis University School of Management; where learners become leaders in the Jesuit tradition.

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: Just for the warm fuzzies.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I believe in the innate goodness of people and that individuals drive economies.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them create mission-based brands.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: J'ai tout ce que je dsire, la sant et la volont. Je veux aider d'autres femmes qui ont aussi le dsir de progresser et la volont de russir. Il suffit de si peu quelque fois pour russir. Je voudrais faire partie de ces gens qui aident les autres russir, car j'ai russi.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees, colleagues and managers understand policies and procedures and also help them deal with others, ask to others and explain to others.

lender.name: Ken & Susan
lender.loan_because: We believe in being the change that we want to see in the world. One person at a time, a difference is made. We're all citizens of this planet, and as best we can, we're trying to be good neighbors.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: while the pen indeed can be mightier than the sword at times both get beaten by cash in hand.

lender.name: ARNOLD
lender.loan_because: I Want to go abroad in New Zealand since Im an animal science graduate and my school is highly accredited in new zealand.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: People in the developing world should have a chance to improve their quality of life and help bolster the economies of their societies.
lender.occupational_info: I provide emergency medical care to the ill or injured, both while on military duty and at home in the U.S., working on an ambulance.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: All that I have is from our Lord so I must return it to Him through tithes and wonderful programs such as this one.
lender.occupational_info: I have to resolve our customer's computer related issues which can be a wide range of items.

lender.name: John M
lender.loan_because: I want you to be a success. I know you can succeed! You must have faith in your ability. I believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: Doing repairs in homes and apartments, including plumbing, electrical, painting, and general repairs.

lender.name: Farrah
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Everybody should do something!
lender.occupational_info: Overseas construction and project management.

lender.loan_because: I need better karma

lender.loan_because: Karma, Pay It Forward, whatever you call it... it works.

lender.occupational_info: artist

lender.loan_because: its important to try

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to open a small retail business.
lender.occupational_info: I am just call center agent but I want to be succeed in my life. That is why I decided to goto your site and ask for a little help.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: I hope that small steps can lead to small changes that mean a lot to the people involved.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles about different topics for magazines and newspapers.

lender.name: Dan and Rosemary
lender.loan_because: We care about our brothers and sisters and want them to have the opportunities afforded to us - a chance to improve their status in life

lender.name: manu
lender.occupation: stay at home mom of 2 kids

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I provide technical support for a computer software company.

lender.name: Kishan Shah
lender.loan_because: bridge inequality, help the impoverished, create opportunity.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for is called Legacy Leaders. We conduct planned giving campaigns for non profit organizations

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: I believe in social justice and sustainable development

lender.name: Paul and Liz
lender.loan_because: We care about people :)
lender.occupational_info: We teach kids.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Melena
lender.loan_because: Its an Incredible opportunity to help those that would other wise be out of reach to me! And I love it

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of empowerment.

lender.name: Hubert
lender.loan_because: As a teacher for more than eight years one of my taks is to help poor rural and urban disabled children to get a significant learning level. To make this, extra courses and tutoring are offered by a group of friends and I in the houses of the pupils with disabilities. Since the beginning of 2007 we have found a small estate to hold our courses but materials such as tables, benches, boards and 5 computors are still needed. Please Help!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: We offer special education to children with disabilities in Fada N'Gourma a town where such school does not exist. The courses consist to tutor children who have difficulties to hear or see, who cannot use their fingers accordingly, who suffer mental retardation. After the normal hours of school we meet them in a house in order to help them understand what they were taught in the morning, the evening of the previous day.

lender.name: FYS 23
lender.loan_because: There are lots of ways to make progress toward a better life. College is one, Kiva is another.
lender.occupational_info: I funded a loan in honor of my 15 freshman (college) advisees in the fall of 2008. They are now seniors, and I hope to see all of them graduate.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: there is a need for small business to have access to capital to help there business be sucessful.
lender.occupational_info: My work as a student is informative and challenging.

lender.name: Andrea and Dave
lender.occupation: Graphic Artist and Documentary Production Manager
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help people all over the world live the lives they deserve.

lender.name: bat
lender.loan_because: it's a great way of helping out - an amazing initiative!

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with what I have to give back to His people!
lender.occupational_info: I encourage students from the age of 12-18 (specifically) in weekly bible studies and activities. My main job is taking the gospel of Christ to the world!

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: I would like to see those I loan to succeed and be able to loan to others.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I travel, and have learned enormous respect for the work ethics, integrity and intelligence of the people I've met. I'm always profoundly struck by the inequality of where we happened to be born, and this is a way I can help a little.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies understand what people want from them, and how to be more successful by making them happy.

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: so many people are trying to get ahead with hard and honest work... feels great to help out even a little bit!
lender.occupational_info: I help people use computers to create better medicines and health products.

lender.name: Mollie 2-1
lender.loan_because: 1) It's a great way to directly lend a hand to another person in a developing country; 2) I have been blessed with enough to give; and 3) Jesus fought alongside the poor for justice.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full time MBA student at the University of St. Thomas in Minneapolis, MN. I hope to use the knowledge I gain in the program to work in a microfinance organization someday.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners promote and market their companies.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Judith is our mom, she past away on September 14, 2007. She wanted to help and does so from heaven.

lender.name: Kirti & Vimal
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who help themselves

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live the life that I have and would like to help others that have not had my opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office for a real estate company.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: Ten years of volunteering in South Africa has heightened my interest in the struggles of people in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and devote most of my energies to volunteer work in schools in South Africa and volunteer work on environmental issues.

lender.name: Kathy Dannel Vitcak
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We own a small vacation resort, I raise alpacas, chickens, hopefully will raise yaks soon, and do graphic design. I am also an artist and spiritual entrepreneur.

lender.name: Todd & Carolina
lender.loan_because: Practical, relevant way to fight poverty and wealth disparity, we love it!!
lender.occupational_info: Business Promotion, and Development.

lender.name: jcurious
lender.loan_because: enjoy helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: work with computers and networks

lender.name: Roxana
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help people with even with a little amount of money. :)

lender.name: Carl & Cassie
lender.loan_because: We strive to make the world a smaller place.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Athena
lender.loan_because: Because I love my fellow human beings.

lender.name: Larry & Jayne
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Easier than theirs.

lender.name: Charlemagne
lender.loan_because: i love to assist people in needs.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. For less then the price of a moderate dinner out, I can help someone become self sufficient. That is awesome!
lender.occupational_info: Customer service

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I can. And I should. It's the right thing to do. :)

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I loan because this is a great idea that genuinely helps people. A bank would never give loans like this to people that truly need it and it makes sense so I do it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the technology of audio and video for a aquarium in Chicago IL www.sheddaquarium.org

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to spend a little time in Peru and I want to give back to a community that is so full of warmth, tradition, and colorful spirit.

lender.name: candice
lender.loan_because: I have owned two businesses in the past. As a teacher I feel I have a duty to help others as others have helped me. I know what a great feeling of freedom that accompanies being an entrepreneur. It is a reward in itself to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am college instructor at a private college. I teach computer technology and business courses to a diverse population of adult learners.

lender.name: Bolton Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who despite of their situation are working hard and staying honest. Specially those single parents who try hard and raise their kids with good moral values. This is the message we try to get across our children as well. Our children participate in the selection of the person to lend to so they can feel that they have made a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Very interesting, I work in a firm that designs control systems for trains.

lender.name: The Ben Ezra's
lender.loan_because: Life is supposed to be beautiful and if we can make a positive change in the life of somebody less fortunate than us, then we will.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at business school.

lender.name: Low Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference even if it is a small one.
lender.occupational_info: IT professional

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I'm terrible with money. It's better that I put some of mine in the hands of another who might help me to better understand it's value.
lender.occupational_info: I'd like to make some sort of difference where I am able.

lender.name: Ferrell
lender.loan_because: because I can and because the feeling of accomplishment is far more powerful and potent for an individual and a society than simple hand outs.
lender.occupational_info: I create the management of information which in turn allows businesses and organizations to function far more efficiently

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?
lender.occupational_info: I own a Property Restoration company in Italy

lender.name: Catherina
lender.loan_because: I have what others do not have, I'm very lucky. I loan only to woman - it gives me strength to have the impression to contribute to the female empowerment first of all in countries where they are disadvantaged.
lender.occupational_info: I own a travel agency in Italy - organizing trips around Italy for people from all over the world

lender.name: Pascal
lender.loan_because: I love the concept... you are not doing charity, just helping people to grow in their business & life. That's really sustainable help compared to emergencies treated by most non profit organizations.
lender.occupational_info: well ... practically, spending my days in front of a computer or in meetings across Europe... my company is operating in vegetable oils (yes for your salads !)

lender.name: Merv
lender.loan_because: To help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Small business of 2 main streams: advising on horse racing administration, and producing corporate audio-visuals for businesses and organisations.

lender.name: atul
lender.loan_because: I believe it can, albeit in a small way, help somebody who is in need.
lender.occupational_info: related to economics, management consulting, statistics and finance.

lender.name: Sabine und Roland

lender.name: James

lender.name: Samantha and Riley
lender.loan_because:
This was the gift my mother wanted for her birthday.
I also was loaned money when I needed to go to University so I am pleased to help others build a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students who do not do well in school. I help them to learn. I also have students from around the world live in my house and I teach them English.

lender.loan_because: I can.
